name: GREEK CHALLENGE
goal:
Awareness of importance of economic impact of sailing regattas such as the America's Cup, VOR etc.
Full participation in the America's Cup as a competitor.
Establishment of manufacturing processes for amphibious aircraft, WIG crafts, Hovercrafts.
Research & Development in LENR.
Specialized telecommunication products.
